description: The app is very easy to use and more than enough for personal usage.
summary: Great app to draw a quick interior design

description: I created an exact plan for the whole house we build. The plan included garden, levels, roof, electricity, sanitary, ventilation and furniture. The 3D view and rendering helped us a lot in decision finding by designing several solutions for comparison.

Nice app, took some time to get used to (I have no comparison, except for CAD and this is way easier than doing floorplans in CAD). It helped a lot when designing my future home, also with furniture planning. 3D view is nice, but I found it usefull after some time when we were deciding on textures and colors, I have applied textures, for most of the planning used trusty box object, where you can apply textures on sided, that was easy and very informative.

Thank you.
summary: Great tool for working with floorplans

description:
Very easy to get quick results, all while being quite flexible. I created a plan for the first floor for the house we're buying in 30 mins having, never used it before. I used the plan to get an idea of how to decorate and rearrange the kitchen, and the result was very convincing. The raytraced photo you can create is a very nice touch.

My only improvement would be to more precise positioning, settings distance constraints between objects, like windows, doors, walls and furniture.
summary: Created the first floor plan in 30 min, very convincing result

description:
I have never used a new app this quickly and efficiently. Especially considering that I have never designed a floorplan.
Huge kudos to the devs for this slick piece of software!

summary: It doesnt work on endless os
